import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import "./css/Home.css" import Search from './Search' import Item from './Item' export default function Home({addBasket,removeBasket}) { let state=useSelector(state=>state.home) let dispatch=useDispatch() console.log(state); const allGroceries=[...state.data] return (
